sources.title: One Last Heist (The Hatton Garden Job) | Action Crime | Bank Robbery | True Story
sources.description:

Just days after leaving prison, a mysterious thief known only as ‚ÄúXXX‚Äù (Matthew Goode) is presented with an opportunity to take down the  exclusive Hatton Garden vault. sources.description:
